meanings.definition: A type of small, reddish-brown worm commonly found in freshwater habitats.
meanings.sent1: The tubifex wriggled in the muddy water.
meanings.sent2: Fish in the pond enjoy feasting on tubifex worms.
meanings.sent3: The tubifex decided to throw a tiny party in the puddle.
meanings.sent4: The tubifex, a tiny explorer, ventured through the underwater jungle.
meanings.sent5: Children love observing tubifex worms squirming in the creek.
